name: Mine-Worker
look: A scared looking worker of the mine.

name: Another worker
look: Another worker of the mines, he seems tired.

name: A bokoblin
look: An aggressive bokoblin. Has it something to do with the accident?

name: a skultulla
look: Eww it's a skultulla! I hate those spiders!

look: A Stalfols. I guess it wants a fight!

name: skilled mineworker
look: Another worker. He says that he searches for a hammer. He offers to build a bridge to the other side if I find it for him.
